A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite the mixed reviews\, I thoroughly enjoyed this next installment of the Star Wars saga! Certainly\, it held a few surprises and it's epic moments did not at all disappoint. The character development was phenomenal. Mark Hamill\, Carrie Fisher\, and Adam Driver were partciluarly spectacular in their respective roles\, but all the other actors did such all great job as well. I won't spoil anything for you\, but it is all must-see film and I can't wait to see where the last film of this new trilogy will take us.
